response.original_title: Nightmare Time: Forever and Always & Time Bastard
response.overview: ‘Forever & Always’ - When Emma Perkins & Paul Matthews get hitched, dark secrets from Emma's past resurface to threaten the couple's marriage... and their lives.  and  ’Time Bastard’ - Ted, the office slime-ball from CCRP, discovers he has the power to travel through time. When he uses that power for his own benefit, all hell breaks loose.
response.tagline: When Emma & Paul get married, dark secrets emerge. Meanwhile, Ted Spankoffski travels through time to horrific ends.
response.title: Nightmare Time: Forever and Always & Time Bastard
